attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I implore you as a democratic government, and 'blood'relatives of thousands of Rhodesians, to pull finger and help and despose mugabe.
The British governement went 'free-willy' into iraq,for who? When our own people are starving and dying in zimbabwe. They are trapped in a huge prison with no hope and no chance in helll of escape unless they receive help from their ancestors!.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
